item.title: Mocks Considered Harmful
item.description: Even though Mocks, Spies, Fakes, and Stubs were part of our testing toolchain in the past, we should avoid using them in modern software development!

item.title: Hello World
item.description: The beginning is always today! As of today, I’m going to write my thoughts on geeky subjects here: fun main() { println("Hello World :)") } After all, it’s all about the beginnings: The ending is nearer than you think, and it is already written. All that we have left to choose is the correct moment to begin Let’s hope this is the right moment for me!

item.title: About
item.description: I’m a software engineer with a pssion to learn, to teach and to solve real world’s problems with products that delight and inspire. Over the years, I helped customers to build applications in various business sectors ranging from Open Banking APIs to Advertising Platforms.
